title: The division of radiophysics
brief_description: Describes the current research work being undertaken by the CSIRO division of Radiophysics, including radio astronomy, moon echoes, radar meteorology, radio-controlled models, rain making, electronic computing, radar aids to navigation, aids to airport control, and upper air investigations.
